verses.name: Job 41:7
verses.text: Canst thou fill his skin with barbed irons? or his head with fish spears?

verses.name: Job 41:8
verses.text: Lay thine hand upon him, remember the battle, do no more.

verses.name: Job 41:9
verses.text: Behold, the hope of him is in vain: shall not one be cast down even at the sight of him?

verses.name: Job 41:10
verses.text: None is so fierce that dare stir him up: who then is able to stand before me?

verses.name: Job 41:11
verses.text: Who hath prevented me, that I should repay him? whatsoever is under the whole heaven is mine.

verses.name: Job 41:12
verses.text: I will not conceal his parts, nor his power, nor his comely proportion.
